text: A company that makes shoes. It has the catchiest tagline of all its competitors. Michael Jordan became their ambassador.
An online marketplace where you can buy everything from a hairpin to a stove. The brand has its locations across the globe.
An animation studio that has made films like Toy Story, Inside Out, and Luca.
One of the most distinguished mobile handset companies in the world that also makes computers, RFID Tags, smartwatches, and entertainment essentials.
A highly appreciated company that creates sets of brick toys for players to play.
An online streaming platform to watch entertainment on demand such as movies, TV shows, documentaries, and so on.
A service to book cabs, autos, or bikes, on demand as well as to order food.
A service to rent housing for brief or long duration in any country.
